backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, authorization checks, blob-backed project storage, and CRUD operations for projects.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a frontend error‑parsing improvement with referenced files, components, and test ID REQ‑27.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Mapping of many frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries used for build or documentation purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme tokens and applying base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router and wraps the app in AuthGate, theme provider, and toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate that handles II login state, waits for actor readiness, and triggers profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Shared page layout with header, themed background layers, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/features/editor/AudioEditor: Main editor page that loads project data, checks backend readiness, initializes the audio engine, and displays upload, controls, panels, mixer, and export UI.
frontend/src/features/editor/components/: Panel for tempo analysis, optional tempo override, and generating AI-based accompaniment stems using the audio engine.
Card for uploading, validating, and loading an audio file into a project, with drag-and-drop, backend readiness checks, and upload progress.
Equalizer UI letting users enable EQ, adjust frequency bands, and reset EQ settings via the audio engine.
Exports mixed audio or individual stems by rendering buffers offline and triggering file downloads.
Mixer interface for adjusting volume, mute, and solo states of separated or generated stems.
Panel to start stem separation, display progress or errors, and confirm completion of separated stems.
UI component providing play/pause, seeking, and volume control using the audio engine.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useAu: Main audio engine hook managing audio loading, playback, stems, EQ, tempo analysis, and accompaniment generation.
Handles playback state, timing, seeking, and duration tracking for audio transport.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useEq: Manages equalizer state and filter chain setup for adjustable audio EQ bands.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useSt: Maintains and updates stem volumes, mute, solo states, and generated stem cleanup.
Simulates stem separation with progress tracking, error handling, and reset support.
frontend/src/features/editor/hooks/useTe: Provides async tempo estimation with loading and error state management.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/accom: Generates synthesized drum, bass, and guitar accompaniment buffers based on tempo.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/audio: Validates uploaded audio files for type, MIME, and size limits.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/downl: Encodes an AudioBuffer to WAV and triggers a browser download.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/offli: Renders mixed audio or stems offline, applying volume and EQ as needed.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/tempo: Implements browser‑only BPM estimation by downsampling audio, detecting energy peaks, and converting intervals to a clamped BPM value.
frontend/src/features/editor/utils/wavEn: Encodes an AudioBuffer into a 16‑bit PCM WAV Blob by interleaving channels and writing WAV headers.
frontend/src/features/projects/component: Provides a dialog for creating new projects with validation, backend readiness checks, and error‑handled submission.
frontend/src/features/projects/ProjectsP: Displays the projects list with backend readiness handling, loading states, error messaging, and navigation to individual project editors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorConnection.ts: Builds a resilient backend actor connection with explicit loading/error states and manual retry behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Derives a unified readiness state and user‑facing messaging from actor connection status, including retry support.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, loading stored identities, login flow, and exposes identity status via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, projects, and project files through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light/dark themes and app background layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Utility for extracting and normalizing backend error messages into user-friendly summaries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Functions to read, persist, and clear URL parameters and session-stored parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app features, issues, and versioned state for planning and fixes.
